title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
description: The bug report indicates an issue with the storage of absolute paths for included libraries in BIRT report designs.
OB: The report design currently stores the absolute path of the library, for example: 'E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary'.
EB: The expected behavior is to save the relative path of the included library.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open BIRT designer.
2. Load a report design located in a project directory, for instance, $project/test.
3. Include a library from another location, such as $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
4. Verify that the BIRT designer generates and saves the relative path instead of the absolute path.
